answers.answer: Well i was a ftm and my baby came at 38+3.They come when they want.
Dang Im 35 as of today and no lie I feel some awkward sensation in my bum area
Im also 28 weeks my baby is also big she weights 3 pounds already now im nervous i wont get to 40 weeks.. Im going to ask my dr to induce me at 37 weeks.... How much does your baby weight??
I am currently 2 days over due. My baby weighed approximately almost 7lbs at 37 weeks.!
My last ultrasound  was  at 31 weeks.  Approximate weight was  3 pounds, 10 oz. My daughter  was born at 38+3, weighing 6 pounds,  13 oz

Babies grow at different rates. Baby might seem big now but end up average. And unless baby is 10 pounds at 37 weeks they won't induce you. They will índuce at 37 weeks of there's a medical issue, that's it. Being bug isn't considered an issue unless there's something like gestational diabetes
Both of mine came early.My first was due April 7 2010 had him April 3 2010My second was due October 13 2014 had him October 12 2014
Im a ftm and had my son right on my 40weeks but ever since i was 36weeks my doctor told me that he could come anytime so im guessing is ok at 36
My water broke on its own at 37.5 weeks for my first child. He was 6lbs 14oz

My first came at 38 weeks on the dot.My second ended up cesarian at 39 1/2 weeks (reason for cesarian unrelated to diabetes - she was tied up in the umbilical cord and was unable to drop), though I was probably in labor for at least 3 - 4 days before she was finally delivered.

question: Hi I'm 28weeks I was just wondering how  likely is it that babies come before 40weeks I'm due May 3rd but he's so big already everyone saying he won't make it till May . I was hoping he came around 36weeks
title: did your baby come before 40weeks
